hero.title: Master Any Subject with Smart Flashcards
hero.subtitle: Advanced spaced repetition system that adapts to your learning pace. Create, study, and track your progress efficiently.

smartLearning.title: Smart Learning
smartLearning.description: Our spaced repetition algorithm adapts to your performance, optimizing your study schedule for maximum retention.

progressTracking.title: Progress Tracking
progressTracking.description: Monitor your learning journey with detailed statistics and insights about your study patterns.

studyAnywhere.title: Study Anywhere
studyAnywhere.description: Access your flashcards on any device. Your progress syncs automatically across all platforms.

dashboard.overview: Here's an overview of your learning progress

boxes.title: Your Flashcard Boxes
boxes.createDesc: Start a new collection of flashcards
